= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.ACTION.CLONE_VM
= General description = This action is used to clone existing Virtual Machine in the vCenter server.
If "Linked clone" is selected as Yes then user must provide a Reference Snapshot of source VM.
Note: * If user does not provide an input to "Target Folder path" or gives the input as "/", the VM will be created at the root of the datacenter. * User needs to provide atleast one of Target Place (Resource Pool, Datacenter, VApp) or Host name or both for Target VM. * If user selects Target Place but does not provide Target Place Name we are ignoring it. * If user selects Target Place as "None" then value given for the Target Place Name will be ignored.
= Failure Conditions = * No or multiple Target place/Host name exists for specified filter criteria. * No or multiple Source VM(s) exists for specified filter criteria. * Virtual Machine with the same name already exist at Target folder path.
= Inputs = * Server IP or DNS : Specify IP address or DNS name of the vSphere server to which you want to connect. E.g. www.myvcenter.com * Username : Username which will be used for this connection. E.g. domain\username * Password : Password to your username. * Port : Specify port which will be used for connection. E.g. 8080 * Protocol : Specify protocol you want to use for connection. E.g. https, http * Source Virtual Machine name : Specify virtual machine to clone. E.g. mySrcVM * Source Location : SSpecify name of vSphere container objects like ResourcePool, VApp, Host name, Folder, Cluster, Datacenter name where VM(s) are located. E.g. UcdCluster * Source Folder path : Specify full folder path for the source Virtual Machine. E.g. rootfolder/subfolder. * Target Virtual Machine name : Specify a new name for the Virtual Machine to be created. E.g. TeamVm * Target Datacenter name : Specify a datacenter in which Virtual Machine will be created. E.g. Ucddatacenter * Target place : Select the target place in which Virtual Machine will be created. * Target place name : Specify the name of the target place [Resource pool, Cluster or VApp] in which VM will be created. E.g. myCluster * Host name : Specify the host on which you want to create the new Virtual Machine. E.g. myvmhost * Target Folder path : Specify full folder path for the target Virtual Machine. E.g. rootfolder/subfolder * Linked clone : Specify if new Virtual Machine. will be linked to Snapshot. * Reference Snapshot : Specify Reference Snapshot name if you are creating Linked Clone. E.g. myvmsnapshot1 * Overwrite Agent : Overwrites the default agent * Overwrite Login : Overwrites the default login
= Behaviour = (none)
=Return Value= (none)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 in case of success. * Return code is 1 in case of failure.
= Logging = Logs will be displayed in the AE report.
= Example = (none)
